sourcesContent:
<template>
    <header class="header">
      <MainContent/>
      <SmMenu v-if="menuOpen"/>
    </header>
</template>

<script>
import MainContent from '@/components/header/MainContent.vue'
import HeaderHamburger from '@/components/header/HeaderHamburger.vue'
import SmMenu from '@/components/header/SmMenu.vue'
export default {
  name: 'MainHeader',
  components:{
    MainContent,
    HeaderHamburger,
    SmMenu
  },
  data() {
    return {
      menuOpen: false,
      console.log(menuOpen)
    };
  },
  methods: {
    toggleMenu() {
      this.menuOpen = !this.menuOpen;
      console.log(menuOpen)
    },
  },
}
</script>

<style lang="scss">
  .header{
    background-color:red;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    padding: 1rem 0rem;
    position: fixed;
    width: 100%;
    z-index: 1000;
    top:0;
    right: 0;
    left:0;
    background: #000;
    background: #fff;
    box-shadow: 0 10px 100px rgba(0,0,0,.1);

  }
</style>
